summary: Defines a reusable base test class that verifies the correct behavior of Django models employing the order_with_respect_to feature, covering order modifications, default insertion ordering, perâ€‘item ordering, navigation between previous and next objects, and recursive ordering cases.
business_intent: Validate that the order_with_respect_to mechanism functions reliably across diverse scenarios, ensuring that applications depending on ordered relationships maintain consistent and predictable ordering of related model instances.
